testcase.purpose: Check if all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to their correct values when battery is charging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test. 3. Waiting for battery level change to fire levelchange event, maybe need a long time.

testcase.purpose: Check if all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to their correct values when battery is discharging

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is unplugged from the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must neither be empty or full, nor reach empty or full capacity during the test. 3. Waiting for battery level change to fire levelchange event, maybe need a long time.

testcase.purpose: Check if all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to their correct values when battery is full

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery is full.

testcase.purpose: Check if validates that all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to correct values, with corresponding events fired, when the charger is plugged in.

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is unplugged from the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must not be full or reach full capacity during the time the test is run.

testcase.purpose: Check if that all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to correct values, with corresponding events fired, when the charger is unplugged.

description.pre_condition: 1. The device is plugged in to the charger before this test is run. 2. The battery must not be full or reach full capacity during the time the test is run.

testcase.purpose: Check if that all of the BatteryManager attributes exist and are set to correct values, with corresponding events fired, when the charger is unplugged.
Check if navigator.getBattery() shall always return the same promise
Check if getBattery is present on navigator
Check if window has an own property BatteryManager
Check if battery inherits from EventTarget
Check if charging attribute exists
Check if charging attribute is readonly
Check if chargingTime attribute exists
Check if chargingTime attribute is readonly
Check if dischargingTime attribute exists
Check if dischargingTime attribute is readonly
Check if level attribute exists
Check if level attribute is readonly
Check if onchargingchange attribute exists
Check if onchargingchange is null
Check if onchargingchange is set to function

Check if onchargingchange: treat object with non-callable call property as null
Check if onchargingchange: treat string as null
Check if onchargingchange: treat number as null
Check if onchargingchange: treat undefined as null
Check if onchargingchange: treat array as null

Check if onchargingtimechange is null
Check if onchargingtimechange is set to function
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat object as null
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat object with non-callable call property as null
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat string as null
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat number as null
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat undefined as null
Check if onchargingtimechange: treat array as null

Check if ondischargingtimechange is null
Check if ondischargingtimechange is set to function
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat object as null
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat object with non-callable call property as null
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat string as null
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat number as null
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat undefined as null
Check if ondischargingtimechange: treat array as null

Check if onlevelchange is null
